title: Subheader Row
reference-overview: The Subheader Row is a Data Table Add-On. It allows you to subdivide and call out groups of data on a Data Table.
reference-usage: Use the Subheader Row when you want to group data within a Data Table together.
reference-details:
Color

Subheader Rows should default to the color #e8f0s7

Width

You can set column width using a helper Class. Since the Static Data Table functions within the Mercer Grid System, it will automatically adapt and configure itself.

Row Details

  • Padding for all Static Data Table rows is set to five pixels on the top and bottom and ten pixels to the left and right.
  • Line height of Basic Data Table Subheader Rows is 13 pixels to keep text consistent with Mercer branding.
  • Subheader Row text is left aligned.
  • Subheader Row text is always in bold.
